Description: Rectangular limestone stela: figure of a haloed figure of Apa Pachom (Pachomius) with hands raised; Coptic text beneath the feet with name `Pachom'; border of vine plants with grapes issuing from two amphorae in the lower corners.
Bibliographic references: Vikan 1995 / Catalogue of sculpture in the Dumbarton Oaks Collection from the Ptolemaic Period to the Renaissance (55-57, pl.21.1) (comparanda for Washington DC 1995, no. 21)
Paris 2000 / L'art copte en Égypte 2000 ans de christianisme: Exposition présentée à l’Institut du monde arabe, Paris (no.11, p.43)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.239)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.26, fig.1)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil' 2000 30 Sep-2001 7 Jan, France, La Clape, Musée de l’Ephebe, L’art copte en Egypte 2000 15 May-3 Sep, France, Paris, Institut du Monde Arabe, Coptic Art
